mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NUM , MEMBER_ID , TITLE , B_CONTENT , B_DATE , PLACE , LONGITUDE , LATITUDE , MEET_TIME , NUM_PEOPLE ) VALUES ( seq_board.nextval, #{member_Id}, #{title}, #{b_Content}, sysdate, #{place}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, REPLACE(#{meet_Time},':',''), #{num_People} )
mapper.select: select board.* , na_member.m_profile, na_member.m_name, na_member.temper from BOARD JOIN NA_MEMBER ON BOARD.MEMBER_ID = NA_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID
select board.* , na_member.m_profile, na_member.m_name, na_member.temper from BOARD JOIN NA_MEMBER ON BOARD.MEMBER_ID = NA_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID where board_Num = #{board_Num}
